mapper.insert: insert into bd_scoretable_items (itemid, psnr, pfbz, fz, xh, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, flag) values (#{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pfbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update bd_scoretable_items set psnr = #{psnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pfbz = #{pfbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fz = #{fz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xh = #{xh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where itemid = #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select itemid, psnr, pfbz, fz, xh, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by, date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_scoretable_items where itemid = #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select itemid, psnr, pfbz, fz, xh, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by, date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_scoretable_items
